page.title: 14CARS AND TRANSPORT
page.content: Marcham has a dangerous double bend in the middle of the village (photo B). We wanted to find out something about people in Marcham who had cars, and what they used them for. We also wanted to find out what other transport they used. We thought this would give a good picture of what Marcham people are like today. We took round about 500 questionaires, and got answers from over half. We then used the {QUEST} computer program to analyze the figures. We took 100 answers, selecting them from different parts of the village. The figures are on page 15.
